title: Manufactured Home For Rent!! Doublewide 3 bedroom home
app_fee: Community Application fee based on number of adults on application.
posting_body: Find your perfect home at Oakland Glens, a family-friendly, well-maintained, professionally managed manufactured home community.
Oakland Glens is proud to be located in the Walled Lake School District and within miles of many dining, shopping, and entertainment venues!
Right now, you could rent a 3 bedroom 2 bathroom home with 1568 sq feet of space in a highly sought after location.
That’s a deal worth investing in!
Call Leasing today and mention site #248!!
